info.name: BlurNSFW
info.description: Blurs images and videos until you hover over them.

changelog.title: What's New?
items: Account switching no longer causes crashes.
Blur/unblur status should be remembered better between reloads.

defaultConfig.name: Blur NSFW Channels
defaultConfig.note: This setting automatically blurs media in channels marked NSFW.

defaultConfig.name: Blur Size
defaultConfig.note: The size (in px) of the blurred pixels.

defaultConfig.name: Blur Time
defaultConfig.note: The time (in ms) it takes for the blur to disappear and reappear.

defaultConfig.name: Blur When Focused
defaultConfig.note: This setting keeps the blur when clicking on/expanding an image.
